original: intros Hf Hg Hminus. assert (Hopp: Lim (fun y : R => - g y) x = Rbar_opp (Lim g x)). apply Lim_opp. assert (Hplus: Lim (fun y : R => f y + - g y) x = Rbar_plus (Lim f x) (Rbar_opp (Lim g x))). apply Lim_plus. apply Hf. apply ex_lim_opp. apply Hg. apply Hminus. rewrite <- Hopp in Hplus. rewrite <- Hplus. apply f_equal_R. apply f_equal_R. apply functional_extensionality. intro y. unfold Rbar_minus. reflexivity.
